title: ChiBitCTy
author: ChiBitCTy
content: Will sell singles. These are all in mint condition. Have always been capsulized and in climate controlled storage.  Right now taking offers. May end up doing auctions..we shall see. I don’t know all the names off hand or mintages. I know the guy faux btc/eth combo is pretty limited (100 maybe), the 1.337 Factom Coin is pretty limited as well. I’ll add more info as time permits. One day I’ll learn how to take decent photos.

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: I have to say, "guy faux" (perhaps related to faketoshi..?) really took me a while

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Can help you out with the mintage of most of ur coins :-)CI 10.000 bits Mintage of 500, 100 of them were called Limited Edition (number laser etched in the hologram) Denomination of 0.01 BTCCI Phoenix Mintage of 100 pieces Denomination of 0.01 BTCCI From Satoshi to the World- Mintage of 100 pieces Denomination of 0.01 BTCCI & PR1MAL CYPER CoinBTC Version- Mintage of 100 pieces  Denomination of 0.01 BTCETH Version- Mintage of 200 pieces  Denomination of 0.01 ETHDont have any infos about the FACTOM coin. Never heard about it to be honest

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Nice CI collection here.Seek4er did a great job with providing info on these rarities.The Factom coin was sold via exclusively via twitter if I remember correctly. Cannot find any posts about it though.It is also briefly mentioned in the official CI info thread here (page 2) https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1539742.0Maybe snarfbag has more info on it.@Chibi: Guy Faux, very 'murican.  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guy_Fawkes

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: 100 of the Factum coins were issued. There are serialized as well #1-100

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on July 11, 2023, 06:16:03 AMI have to say, "guy faux" (perhaps related to faketoshi..?) really took me a while  Took me a while as well.  Didn't see it until someone said something, then I was like oh yeah that is the guy faux mask lol.  I love these coins, one of my favorite CI coins.Quote from: Kryptowerk on July 11, 2023, 04:42:59 PM@Chibi: Guy Faux, very 'murican.  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guy_FawkesLol what do you mean by that, what do you Euro's call it?  EDIT: now I see what you mean lolI actually refer to it as the Anonymous Mask. I have a slight obsession with hacktivists, and when I first learned about Anonymous Hacking SeaWorld (SeaWorld is a prison for animals, and I encourage everyone to never support captive cetaceans as it's beyond cruel. Honestly any zoo is unless it's accredited/sanctuary) I somehow came across bitcoin at the same time. I think it was mentioned in the article.  Then I found the anonymous mint and their coin that had both the anonymous mask and bitcoin on each side.  That was my first every physical bitcoin...as they say the rest is history. Thank you Seek3r and Steeley!!! FYI I have been slammed today..I will be returning DMs shortly.
